display_long_description:
# AVAILABLE PLANS
- Base Game (No Subscription): $29.99
- Annual Training Plan: $34/month
- Monthly Training Plan: $59/month

The only app fully licensed by the NHL.

# MAKE ANY SPACE YOUR VIRTUAL RINK
Get ready to experience hockey like never before - full ice games, training drills for goalies and players, and a whole lot more while geared up just like a real NHLer. 

# BRAND NEW GAME MODE: 2025 STANLEY CUP PLAYOFFS 3v3
This new 3V3-style, “free move” gameplay is part of our 2025 Stanley Cup Playoffs mode. Play as your favorite NHL team in an authentic Stanley Cup Playoffs bracket in a thrilling best-of-7 series against real NHL opponents!
[media]

# BECOME AN NHL LEGEND
Level up with our progression system as you play across 32 NHL Season games, and take on the playoffs where you can win the Stanley Cup!

[media]

# ADVANCE YOUR GOALIE SKILLS
Master your angle positioning, shot release reactions, and saves through traffic, all while warming up mentally before games or practices. 
[media]

# IMPROVE YOUR HOCKEY IQ
Boost on-ice performance with targeted drills and training plans to sharpen your  hockey sense, read-and-react skills, and more.
[media]

The Base Game of NHL Sense Arena 25 includes:
- 2024 - 25 NHL Season Mode (32 Games)
- 2025 Stanley Cup Playoffs 3v3 Mode
- 3 unique arenas to Play In
- Open Skate Mode

Unlock tons of more content with our Training plans!
- Everything in the base game
- Over 100+ drills
- Dozens of training plans from USA Hockey, pro coaches, and NHL players
- In-app guidance training
- Unlock all arenas to play in
